devdoc.title: ArrakisV2Helper helpers for querying common info about ArrakisV2 vaults

token0AndToken1ByRange((int24,int24,uint.notice: get underlyings of token0 and token1 in two lists.

token0AndToken1PlusFeesByRange((int24,in.notice: get underlyings and fees of token0 and token1 in two lists.

totalUnderlyingWithFees(address).notice: get total underlying, also returns uncollected fees separately.

totalUnderlyingWithFeesAndLeftOver(addre.notice: get total underlying, also returns uncollected fees and leftover separatly.
